metadata.title: CVE-2020-24999 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: There is an invalid memory access in the function fprintf located inError.cc in Xpdf 4.0.2. It can be triggered by sending a crafted PDF fileto the pdftohtml binary, which allows a remote attacker to cause a Denialof Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ipe package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
